Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.lim.controller.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the main game controller.

      • restartGame

        public boolean restartGame(Room roomCallback)
        this method try to resume a game from a file
        Parameters:
        roomCallback - the room that the game controller belong to
        Returns:
        true if the game is successfully restored false otherwise

        towerColor -
        floor -
        Throws:
        BadRequestException

      • confirmTowerMove

        public void confirmTowerMove(boolean useBp)
                      throws BadRequestException
        This method continues a tower move interrupted to ask the actor whether he wanted to pay the ordinary cost or with his battle points
        Parameters:
        useBp - the decision of the user, it's true if the he wants to pay in battle points
        Throws:
        BadRequestException

      • activatePickedCard

        public void activatePickedCard(Card card,
                               User actor)
        this method activate the immediate effect of a card piked by user
        Parameters:
        card - the card to be activated
        actor - the user who picked the card

      • moveInHarvest

        public void moveInHarvest(FamilyMember fm,
                          int servantsDeployed)
                   throws BadRequestException
        This method performs the actual harvest move. It does not require a reference to the remote user as the harvest has not costs to choose.
        Parameters:
        fm - the family member deployed for the action
        Throws:
        BadRequestException

      • moveInProduction

        public void moveInProduction(FamilyMember fm,
                             int servantsDeployed)
                      throws BadRequestException
        this method is called when a player go to production with a family member, and (optional) using servants
        Parameters:
        fm - the family member put in production
        servantsDeployed - the num of the servants deployed by the user
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if the move is not valid

      • moveInMarket

        public void moveInMarket(FamilyMember fm,
                         int marketSlot,
                         int servantsDeployed)
                  throws BadRequestException
        this method is called when a player go to market with a family member, and (optional) using servants
        Parameters:
        fm - the family member put in the market
        marketSlot - is the position in the market in which the user intend to move to
        servantsDeployed - the num of the servants deployed by the user
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if the provided data are not valid to perform the action

      • moveInCouncil

        public void moveInCouncil(FamilyMember fm,
                          int servantsDeployed)
                   throws BadRequestException
        this method is called when a player go to council with a family member, and (optional) using servants
        Parameters:
        fm - the family member put in the council
        servantsDeployed - the num of the servants deployed by the user
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if the provided servants amount is invalid

      • confirmProduction

        public void confirmProduction(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> choices)
                       throws BadRequestException
        This method completes a production move that was hanging waiting for the user's choice of production options
        Parameters:
        choices - the list of choices made by the user
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if the choices are not correct

      • performFastTowerMove

        public void performFastTowerMove(int servantsDeployed,
                                 java.lang.String towerColor,
                                 int floor,
                                 User actor)
                          throws BadRequestException
        This method performs a fast tower action, activated by an immediate effect, with the data provided by the user
        Parameters:
        servantsDeployed - the amount of servants deployed in the action
        towerColor - the destination tower color
        floor - the destination tower floor
        actor - the actor performing the fast tower move
        Throws:
        BadRequestException
